articles.author: hindustantimes.com
articles.title: ‘He can bowl six yorkers in an over consistently’: Sam Curran on India pacer - Hindustan Times
articles.description: IPL 2022: Curran, who was a part of the Kings XI Punjab (now Punjab Kings) and Chennai Super Kings squads, said Natarajan is someone who can bowl “six yorkers consistently." | Cricket
articles.content: England all-rounder Sam Curran, who did not send his name for IPL 2022 mega auction to work on his rehabilitation, was mighty impressed with Sunrisers Hyderabad pacer T Natarajan. The left-arm pacer,… [+1578 chars]

articles.title: Pakistan vs Australia: Glad we don't have to bowl to Babar Azam anymore, says Finch after winning historic T20I - India Today
articles.description: Lahore T20I: Australia capped off a memorable tour of Pakistan by winning the only T20I by 3 wickets in Lahore on Tuesday. Babar Azam's fifty ended in vain as Pakistan were not able to defend 162-run total.

articles.author: hindustantimes.com
articles.title: ‘Dhoni is one of those genuine massive high-pressure players, Yuvraj isn’t' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India's mental conditioning coach for 2011 World Cup, Paddy Upton believes that it was the right call to promote to Dhoni ahead of Yuvraj in the final. Upton said Dhoni is one of the very few players in the world who is meant for "massive high-pressure" situa…
articles.content: MS Dhoni's decision to promote himself ahead of Yuvraj Singh and then play a match-winning knock of 91* in the final of 2011 World Cup against Sri Lanka at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai remains one … [+2211 chars]
